d:
"Onii-san, it seems like you come to this store a lot, don't you?"

Tomoya's nightly visits to his local conbini aren't for snacks. He's there for the girl who shows up every night. When they finally talk, it quickly becomes clear that she's looking for some funâ€¦ ADULT fun.

A hot and erotic story that starts in a conbini.

n: [Manga] [Toru Takahashi & Hori Hiroaki] Konbini de Deatta Eroi Onnanoko to Tadare Kitta Kankei ni Narimashita - Chapter 4
